body:
Hey Guys,
While I have internet I want to take the time to say thanks for 300 subscribers and thankyou for appricating and watching my content on YouTube (my channel and the community channel). While I have no Internet I would like to take the time to ask for ideas for my 300 subscriber video. I will accept ideas (within reason).

Also just a quick update, I haven't had Internet for 6 weeks because of moving house and other things as well. I am still making videos and whenever I have internet I try to upload a video with the time I have. The first video I hope to upload is the Update Video explaining this all.
As for the community channel... Meet The Member- Tazz was the last video scheduled. I want to focus more on the community channel for now seeing as though it is uploading 1 video a week.

Thats all for now... Peace Out!

title: 300 Subscriber Celebration?

replies.body:
Congrats! <3

Maybe you could do a montage of all you best Avi times you've had. Just a suggestion.
